title: a11y.css
name: a11y.css
description: This file aims to warn front-end devs about mistakes and potential accessibility failures - but it also helps to rate client-side code and to spot its weaknesses.

scripts.webext: npm run webext:css && npm run webext:package:firefox && npm run webext:package:chrome
scripts.webext:prepare: rm -rf webextension/css/a11y-*.css && cp -r css/a11y-*_*.css webextension/css && cp -r css/webextension/show-lang.css webextension/css
scripts.webext:cp: cp -r css/a11y-??.css temp && cp -r css/a11y-?????.css temp
scripts.webext:all: mkdir temp && npm run webext:cp && npm run webext:rename && npm run webext:mv && rm -rf temp
scripts.webext:css: npm run webext:prepare && npm run webext:polyfill && npm run webext:all
scripts.webext:package:firefox: npm run webext:manifest:firefox && cd webextension && zip -r -FS ../a11ycss-webextension-firefox.zip *
scripts.webext:package:chrome: npm run webext:manifest:chrome && cd webextension && zip -r -FS ../a11ycss-webextension-chrome.zip *
